meanings.definition: The act of transporting goods or messages as a courier.
meanings.sent1: Couriering involves delivering packages and letters to different locations.
meanings.sent2: I saw the couriering of important documents to the office every morning.
meanings.sent3: The couriering of birthday gifts made the surprise even more special.
meanings.sent4: Her swift couriering of information across the office earned her praise.
meanings.sent5: The couriering of medical supplies during emergencies saves lives.

meanings.definition: The job or occupation of a courier.
meanings.sent1: His couriering as a delivery person kept him busy all day.
meanings.sent2: She found a job in couriering to earn extra money during the holidays.
meanings.sent3: The couriering profession requires punctuality and reliability.
meanings.sent4: In the world of couriering, speed is of the essence.
meanings.sent5: The couriering industry plays a crucial role in the economy.
